                              java.lang.Short exPort,
                              int ipV4Addr)
Sends a PACKET_OUT ARP request to a switch

Parameters:
dpid - datapath ID
exPort - the port to exempt
ipV4Addr - IPv4 address to resolve
Returns:

getSwitchPortsForARP

protected boolean getSwitchPortsForARP(net.floodlightcontroller.core.IOFSwitch sw_entry,
                                       int ipV4Addr,
                                       org.openflow.northboundapi.util.ARPSuppressList selected,
                                       java.lang.Short exPort,
                                       long now)
Determine if broadcast or individual port ARPs for switch entry.

Returns:
true if broadcast OK (all port suppression intervals expired).

getActiveSwitchList

public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getActiveSwitchList(java.lang.Long dpid)
Get a list of active datapath IDs.

sendARPRequest

public long sendARPRequest(int ipV4Addr,
                           long now,
                           int arp_time,
                           java.lang.Long dpid,
                           java.lang.Short swPort,
                           java.lang.Short exPort)
Sends a PACKET_OUT ARP request to ports on switches.

Parameters:
ipV4Addr - IPv4 address to resolve
now - current time (zero causes query when needed)
arp_time - duration (in milliseconds) since last arp to wait for responses
dpid - null selects all; otherwise specific switch's datapath ID
swPort - null selects all; otherwise specific switch port
exPort - null means no exclusion; otherwise specific switch port to exclude
Returns:
expiration time, in milliseconds. May be zero (no packets sent) or negative (permission denied).

getNextTransactionID

public int getNextTransactionID(long dpid)
Returns the next transaction ID for a given switch

Parameters:
dpid - switch/datapath ID
Returns:
next transaction ID or -1 if dpid was not found

receivedMessagefromClient

public void receivedMessagefromClient(org.openflow.northboundapi.proto.NorthboundAPIPB.MessagePB messagePB)
Description copied from class: AbstractNBClient
This class must be extended to receive messages from client.

This call-back is made from within the connection's reader thread (i.e., no more messages will be received until after this call returns).

Specified by:
receivedMessagefromClient in class AbstractNBClient
